diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Maternally inherited diabetes and deafness leading to intestinal pseudo-obstruction due to A3243G mutation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a history of diabetes mellitus, hearing loss, and symptoms consistent with intestinal pseudo-obstruction. Molecular genetic analysis revealed the mitochondrial A3243G mutation, which was almost homoplasmic in smooth muscle cells. The mutation's association with intestinal pseudo-obstruction was supported by the absence of other known causes. The diagnosis was further corroborated by the patient's presentation and genetic findings.
